title: how to update my cilent to Alpha Cilent?
body: it's not working everytime i do it, it deletes all of my league files and then it gives me error. Is there a way to update my cilent to the new cilent?

replies.body:
There may be an issue with the patcher failing to locate files needed to prepare the update.  Try the following steps to make sure that the patcher can locate it!

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

I hope that helps!
Thank you so much, it works and now i finally can play the new client :)
